Job Title: Inbound Sales Manager

Location: Charlotte, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Townsquare Interactive

**This position requires you to work in our Uptown Charlotte office**

About Townsquare Interactive:

At Townsquare Interactive, we specialize in empowering small and medium-sized businesses to thrive. Our stellar business management platform enhances customer flow, ensuring ongoing success. From comprehensive business management software to website design, SEO, social posts, and reputation monitoring – we've got all your digital needs covered. Our mission is to simplify success for businesses of all sizes.

The Inbound Sales Manager Opportunity:

Our Inbound Sales Team manages inbound leads and outbound follow-up. This team is responsible for re-engaging qualified leads, handling live transfer calls, running demonstrations, and ultimately securing new clients.

As an Inbound Sales Manager, you will play a pivotal role in driving revenue growth by coaching and developing a team of Inbound Sales Representatives. You will be responsible for developing and executing strategies to meet and exceed sales targets, while ensuring an excellent prospect-to-client experience.

Responsibilities:

Lead, manage, and develop a high performing, results driven sales team via training, coaching, and motivatingProvide strong, dynamic leadership that mentors, develops, and guides team members to efficiently leverage every call for maximum conversion rateAchieve and exceed monthly sales goalsPrepare and report on team performance to Senior Leadership team as requiredConduct weekly one-on-one reviews and daily call coaching to build effective communication and understand individual training and development needsAbility to work with Vanilla Soft and Salesforce

Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related fieldProven success in inside sales, with experience leading and/or managing a teamDemonstrated track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets (preferable transactional sales)Strong understanding of sales methodologies, CRM systems, and KPI managementExcellent communication, leadership, and interpersonal skillsAbility to thrive in a fast-paced, results-oriented environment

Benefits:

Competitive base salary and bonus plan3 weeks PTO9 paid holidays (including 2 personal/floating holidays)Volunteer Time OffHealth, Dental, and Vision InsurancePet Insurance401(K) Retirement Plan with Company MatchEmployee Stock Purchase PlanCompany-provided laptopComprehensive training and growth opportunitiesUnlimited growth potential in a dynamic work environment
